titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Codex 758: Chant book

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: Plainsong chants in Gregorian notation with other liturgical texts.

supportDesc.extent: 64 leaves : 168 x 108 mm. bound to 184 x 125 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Parchment; 64; [1-64]; modern foliation in pencil, upper right recto.

layoutDesc.layout: Music is square notation on a five line staff, (f. 1-59r); square notation on a four line staff in two additional hands, (f. 60v-64v).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in a formal Gothic book script by several hands.

decoDesc.decoNote: Red used for initials, capital strokes, and staff.
Later musical notation, Inside front cover

binding.p: Contemporary leather over wooden boards, clasp intact; leather flaking away, particularly along spine.
